answers.answer: Hi there,Low blood pressure can be caused due to low blood volume, hormonal changes, widening of blood vessels, medicine side effects, anemia, heart problems or endocrine problems. There can be several reasons for unexplained weight loss like thyroid hormone imbalances, diabetes mellitus, worm infestation, anaemia etc.Stress, poor eating habits can also lead to weight loss. Treatment of hypotension depends on the cause. It is best to get evaluated for the above mentioned causes. You need to have a nutritious diet rich in all essential minerals and vitamins. It is best to get a general check up done to rule out any pathological causes. Do keep us posted.Take care and regards!
